review: I bought these binders a couple months ago and they are all still holding up except for one whose rings have been deformed. Anyways, these are normal good binders, I bought them for school so they are sufficing my needs. One thing I would reccoment though is to get binders of different colors, it's a slight problem when you're pulling them out of a backpack thus not letting you see the front of them, so it's hard to distinguish them. Overall its a good product and it was worth the 12$ I paid for them(the price went up guys, sorry!).
productTitle: Wilson Jones Round Ring View Binder, 1.5 Inch, Basic, 362 Series, Customizable, White, 4 Pack (W70362-34WPP)
